name: Opposits
description:
Opposits is a Plateformer 2D where you can switch the background's color to black or white to see some plateformes.

KeyMap:

  • Go left with 'Q'
  • Go right with 'D'
  • Jump with 'Space'
  • Switch background's color with 'mouse's left clic'

This game is currently in alpha and i hope i could upload it on Steam and Epic Games soon

Currently 4 Levels

(PS : The Player is a bit vague, i'll fix this on the next version :p )

Some bugs are noticed and will be fixed soon

  • Can't jump on level 4
  • The lightning is stopping
  • The background's color switch is possible during the lightning on level 4
